Interview 3E and EluciDATA Lab in the framework of the campaign "AI to boost your SME" by the FPS Economie

Interview 3E and EluciDATA Lab in the framework of the campaign "AI to boost your SME" by the FPS Economie

Written by eluciDATA
On 21 Aug 2021
In the framework of the campaign "Artificial Intelligence to boost your SME" by the FPS Economie, the EluciDATA Lab shared its experience with the company 3E in an interview.  More information: here.
